resources.string: The phone needs to be connected to a WLAN network

"Your device must be connected to a WLAN network. If you use a metered or paid WLAN connection, you may be charged for the data usage.
For more info, check with your Internet service provider."
Phone must be connected to WLAN network.
Indicates that WLAN is ready, but the phone must be connected to a charger and the battery must be 100% charged.
